pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NEETBox contains use~~ful~~less tiny deeplearning code snippets~~一个自产自销的仓库~~Good news: we are running into this toolbox Bad news: the repo itself is useless. Besides, the repository itself is still under construction and for now it has not much code inside. Nevertheless, we are always adding new code snippets. see also [neetbox.550w.host](https://neetbox.550w.host).
